name: 300+ 2D Projectiles, Icons, and Items
description:
This pack contains over 300 hand-drawn icons in a cartoon, cel-shaded style. Perfect for prototyping and games jams, or to quickly add variety to a game. The assets contain food items, collectibles, powerups, potions, flames and fireballs, ice cystals, sparkles and stars, coins, gems and treasures, common inventory items, and many assorted projectiles.

These icons can easily be used as powerups, particles, pickups, items, or icons. Good for making shooters, bullet hells, Metroidvania platformers, action/adventure games, and simple RPGs.
